name: Temporary Access Pass Added To An Account
description: Detects when a temporary access pass (TAP) is added to an account. TAPs added to priv accounts should be investigated
author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Yochana Henderson, '@Yochana-H'

detection.query: selection: {"properties.message": "Admin registered security info", "Status": "Admin registered temporary access pass method for user"}

falsepositives: Administrator adding a legitimate temporary access pass
